link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd

generic:link.msg:message: Identity "Gross Non Performing Assets percentage = Gross Non Performing Assets/Assets" do not tally.
Identity "Net Non Performing Assets percentage = Net Non Performing Assets/Assets" do not tally.

If the reported value is s "No" in "Whether the company is purely into investment activities without any customer interface?" then details requried in "If No, Please provide the details on type of customer interface the NBFC had" and if the reported value is "Yes" then details not required.

If the reported value is "Yes" in row "Whether the company was holding any Public Deposits as on March 31 of reporting financial year" then amount is required for "(a) If Yes, Please furnish the amount" and if the reported value is "No", then no amount is required.

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 = 'true') then (not(empty( $V2)) and not(empty( $V3))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = 'false') then (empty($V2) and empty($V3)) else 'false')

generic:link.msg:message:
"Reporting of ""(a) If Yes, what is amount received in the form of FDI during reporting financial year (Amount Rs. in lakhs)"" and ""(b) If Yes, did the company fully complied with all the extant directions"" is mandatory, If user selects ""Yes"" for ""Has the company received any FDI?"".
Reporting of ""(a) If Yes, what is amount received in the form of FDI during reporting financial year (Amount Rs. in lakhs)"" and ""(b) If Yes, did the company fully complied with all the extant directions"" is not mandatory, If user selects ""No"" for ""Has the company received any FDI?""."

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 = 'Yes') then ((not(empty($V2))) and (empty($V3))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = 'No') then ((empty($V2)) and (not(empty($V3)))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = 'Not Applicable') then ((empty($V2)) and (empty($V3))) else 'false')

generic:link.msg:message: If the reported value is "Yes" in "Whether the company complied with filing of records of mortgages with the CERSAI?" then only date is required in "If Yes, Date of last such filing with CERSAI" and if the reported value is "No" in "Whether the company complied with filing of records of mortgages with the CERSAI?" then only reason is rquired in "If No, Please choose the reason from the menu for not obtaining of registration from CERSAI" and if the reported value is "Not Applicable" in "Whether the company complied with filing of records of mortgages with the CERSAI?" then details not required".

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 = 'true') then (not(empty( $V2)) and not(empty( $V3))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = 'false') then (empty($V2) and empty($V3)) else 'false')

generic:link.msg:message: If the reported value is "Yes" for "Whether the equity of the company is listed on any of the Stock Exchanges?" then informations are required for "If Yes, (a) Name of the Stock Exchange" and "(b) Date of First Listing" and if the reported value is "No" then information is not required.

If the reported value is "Yes" for "Has there been any takeover/acquisition of control/ change in shareholding/ Management during the year which required prior approval from RBI?" then details required for "(a) If Yes, Please provide the reasons" and if the reported value is "No" then details not required.

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 = 'true') then (not(empty( $V2)) and not(empty( $V3))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = 'false') then (empty($V2) and empty($V3)) else 'false')

generic:link.msg:message: If the reported value is "Yes" for "Whether the Statutory Auditor is appointed by the company in the past?" then informations are required for "If Yes, please share the details the previous contract From Date" and "If Yes, please share the details the previous contract To Date" and if the reported value is "No" then information is not required.
